verbs.description: [ARG1: hawaii dangerous destinations] [V: revealed] drownings are the leading cause of death for visitors to hawaii but one island is seeing a spike in the number of tragedies recently three bay area tourists died there in separate incidents rep jimmy tokioka phua chuan chin adam griffiths andrew doughty jp ryan queens bath sue kanoho nbc bay area investigative unit kauai
